data.eml:eml: Review of the genus Haba Semenov, 1954 (Hymenoptera Chrysididae) with the key to species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Strumia, Franco (2016): Review of the genus Haba Semenov, 1954 (Hymenoptera Chrysididae) with the key to species. Zootaxa 4161 (2): 289-294, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4161.2.11
